name: Jailbird's Flight
description:
made for Ludum Dare 42

what happens when a flood warning comes and you get left behind? find out! you play as jailbird, a prisoner left on the island after a flood warning, collect the rescue items left behind to call the chopper and go home!

WASD to move, click on the interface, esc to pause.
I suck at making games, I couldn't even make music for this one, but hopefully it isn't the worst one.
